text:
OMNI Channel Messaging Extension for HubSpot

<https://help.oapps.xyz/portal/en/kb/articles/HubSpotomnichannel#OMNI_Channel_Messaging_Extension_for_HubSpot>

We had someone purchase the theme over the weekend, only to find out it wasn't compatible with their HubSpot subscription. In the past, if it wasn't compatible, you couldn't purchase a theme - can anyone shed light on whether an update took place and how this can be avoided?
So the answer is Yes I guess

~I mean — I get why this is happening — to be in the incubator, I think you need X amount of download or somethign to get money back from HubSpot — so to help HubSpot get themes in the marketplace, they created this type of behavior~

I guess I’m not sure why this is happening then
i was told that in this specific case, the motivation for the massive change in price was something different.
the theme accelerator is only for free themes <@U25PYL3Q8>
i mean, it is mostly about how much the price changed, if the promotion would have gone from 700$ to 200$ right away, i guess this would have been fine with me :slightly_smiling_face:
